rag_response.question: list pub/sub
rag_response.answer:
[KNOWLEDGE SOURCE: Context Only]

**Overview**

- The Mahaaya technology catalog contains several tools listed with the **Pub/Sub** sub-capability.  These are shown below with their TEB status and short notes.


**Available Pub/Sub tools**

- **Vertex AI** (TEB Status: TEB Approved) — AI/ML platform entry with Pub/Sub sub-capability and enterprise deployment guidance.
- **Istio** (TEB Status: TEB Approved) — Service-mesh/monitoring tool listed under Pub/Sub for integration and governance patterns.
- **Cohere Embed** (TEB Status: TEB Approved) — Analytics/embedding tool with Pub/Sub sub-capability (note: deprecated for new deployments per standards comments).
- **Dataflow** (TEB Status: Deprecated) — Platform tooling listed under Pub/Sub but marked Deprecated; avoid new deployments.


**Recommendation**

- For production Pub/Sub needs prefer tools with TEB Approved status (Vertex AI, Istio, Cohere Embed) and avoid Deprecated entries (Dataflow) unless maintaining legacy systems.
- Verify specific integration, networking and identity requirements (private endpoints, managed identities) in each tool’s EA notes before implementation.


**Notes**

- The list above is drawn directly from the Mahaaya context dataset.  Confirm final selection with the TEB and the capability manager for each tool before proceeding.

tools.name: Vertex AI
tools.description: Vertex AI is used to deliver scalable, reliable capabilities for enterprise workloads. It integrates with identity, networking, and observability services for end‑to‑end governance. Standard deployment patterns include IaC templates, private networking, and workload identities. Security hardening follows CIS benchmarks and zero‑trust principles where applicable. Operational guidance includes backup, monitoring, alerting, and cost optimization practices.
tools.metaTags: Vector Search, Microservices, DevOps, AI Experience Platform
tools.standardsComments: Vendor support SLA reviewed by procurement.
tools.eaNotes: Vendor support SLA reviewed by procurement.

tools.name: Istio
tools.description: Istio is used to deliver scalable, reliable capabilities for enterprise workloads. It integrates with identity, networking, and observability services for end‑to‑end governance. Standard deployment patterns include IaC templates, private networking, and workload identities. Security hardening follows CIS benchmarks and zero‑trust principles where applicable. Operational guidance includes backup, monitoring, alerting, and cost optimization practices.

sources.Description: Kafka is used to deliver scalable, reliable capabilities for enterprise workloads. It integrates with identity, networking, and observability services for end‑to‑end governance. Standard deployment patterns include IaC templates, private networking, and workload identities. Security hardening follows CIS benchmarks and zero‑trust principles where applicable. Operational guidance includes backup, monitoring, alerting, and cost optimization practices.
